AT.name: Art of Balance
AT.description: Entdecke "Art of Balance" - eines der am besten bewerteten und spaßigsten Wii U™ Spiele (Nintendo Life 9/10, Nintendo Enthusiast 9/10, N-Tower 9/10)! Mit 200 Puzzles stellt Art of Balance nicht nur deine Fähigkeiten, sondern auch deine Vorstellungskraft auf die Probe. Mit seinem perfekten Gameplay und photorealistischen Grafik ist "Art of Balance" einfach zu lernen, aber nur schwer wieder aus der Hand zu legen. Spiel alleine oder lade deine Freunde und Familie ein mitzuspielen. Auf der Suche nach einer Herausforderung? Dann trete online gegen Spieler aus aller Welt an, oder treibe im Punktejagd-Modus deinen Online-Hiscore in ungeahnte Höhen. Art of Balance bringt das ultimative "nur noch ein Puzzle"-Gefühl auf deine Wii U™.

AU.name: Art of Balance
AU.description: Discover "Art of Balance" - one of the best rated and most fun Wii U™ Games (Nintendo Life 9/10, Nintendo Enthusiast 9/10, N-Tower 9/10)! 200 levels will challenge your skills and imagination. With its perfect gameplay and almost photo realistic graphics 'Art of Balance' is easy to pick up but hard to put away. Play alone or invite friends and family to drop in at any time for co-op play. Seeking an even bigger challenge? Play online against others or try out the new Endurance mode and improve your Online-Highscore. Art of Balance brings the ultimate “just one more puzzle” experience to your Wii U™.

BG.name: Art of Balance
BG.description: Discover "Art of Balance" - one of the best rated and most fun Wii U™ Games (Nintendo Life 9/10, Nintendo Enthusiast 9/10, N-Tower 9/10)! 200 levels will challenge your skills and imagination. Seeking an even bigger challenge? Play online against others or try out the new Endurance mode and improve your Online-Highscore. Art of Balance brings the ultimate “just one more puzzle” experience to your Wii U™.

BE.name: Art of Balance
BE.description: Découvrez Art of Balance, un des jeux Wii U les mieux notés et les plus fun (Nintendo Life 9/10, Nintendo Enthusiast 9/10, N-Tower 9/10) ! 200 niveaux mettront à l'épreuve vos talents et votre imagination. Grâce à son gameplay idéal et ses graphismes proches de la réalité, Art of Balance est simple à prendre en main et difficile à lâcher. Jouez seul ou invitez vos amis et votre famille à tout moment dans des parties en coopération. Vous cherchez à relever un défi encore plus grand ? Jouez en ligne contre d'autres joueurs, ou essayez le nouveau mode Endurance et améliorez votre Meilleur score en ligne. Découvrez Art of Balance, l'expérience ultime en termes de casse-tête sur votre Wii U !

ES.name: Art of Balance
ES.description: ¡Descubre "Art of Balance", uno de los juegos para Wii U más divertidos y mejor valorados (Nintendo Life 9/10, Nintendo Enthusiast 9/10, N-Tower 9/10)! 200 niveles pondrán a prueba tus habilidades y tu imaginación. Con su mecánica de juego perfecta y sus gráficos de un realismo casi fotográfico, "Art of Balance" es fácil de aprender y difícil de dejar. Juega a solas o invita a tus amigos y familiares a pasar un rato jugando en modo cooperativo. ¿Buscas un reto aún mayor? Juega online contra otros jugadores o prueba el nuevo modo Resistencia y mejora tu récord online. Art of Balance te ofrece la quintaesencia del "solo un puzle más" en tu Wii U.

IT.name: Art of Balance
IT.description: Scopri Art of Balance, uno dei giochi più divertenti e acclamati per Wii U (Nintendo Life 9/10, Nintendo Enthusiast 9/10, N-Tower 9/10)! 200 livelli che metteranno alla prova le tue abilità e la tua immaginazione. Grazie a un gameplay perfetto e a una grafica straordinariamente realistica, una volta iniziato a giocare a Art of Balance non riuscirai più a smettere! Gioca da solo o insieme ad amici e familiari in modalità cooperativa. E se vuoi metterti davvero in gioco, sfida altri giocatori online o scopri la nuova modalità Endurance (Resistenza) e migliora i tuoi record online. Art of Balance è il gioco di rompicapi definitivo per Wii U.

NL.name: Art of Balance
NL.description: Ontdek 'Art of Balance' - een van de best gewaardeerde en leukste Wii U Games (Nintendo Life 9/10, Nintendo Enthusiast 9/10, N-Tower 9/10)! 200 levels zullen je vaardigheden en verbeeldingskracht uitdagen. Met zijn perfecte gameplay en bijna fotorealistische graphics is 'Art of Balance' makkelijk om te leren, maar verdraaid lastig om weg te leggen. Speel alleen of nodig familie en vrienden uit voor een coöperatief potje. Zoek je een nog grotere uitdaging? Speel online tegen anderen of probeer het nieuwe speltype Endurance en verbeter je online record. Art of Balance brengt de ultieme 'nog eentje dan' puzzelbeleving naar je Wii U.

NZ.name: Art of Balance
NZ.description: Discover "Art of Balance" - one of the best rated and most fun Wii U™ Games (Nintendo Life 9/10, Nintendo Enthusiast 9/10, N-Tower 9/10)! 200 levels will challenge your skills and imagination. With its perfect gameplay and almost photo realistic graphics 'Art of Balance' is easy to pick up but hard to put away. Play alone or invite friends and family to drop in at any time for co-op play. Seeking an even bigger challenge? Play online against others or try out the new Endurance mode and improve your Online-Highscore. Art of Balance brings the ultimate “just one more puzzle” experience to your Wii U™.

PL.name: Art of Balance
PL.description: Discover "Art of Balance" - one of the best rated and most fun Wii U™ Games (Nintendo Life 9/10, Nintendo Enthusiast 9/10, N-Tower 9/10)! 200 levels will challenge your skills and imagination. With its perfect gameplay and almost photo realistic graphics 'Art of Balance' is easy to pick up but hard to put away. Play alone or invite friends and family to drop in at any time for co-op play. Seeking an even bigger challenge? Play online against others or try out the new Endurance mode and improve your Online-Highscore. Art of Balance brings the ultimate “just one more puzzle” experience to your Wii U™.

PT.name: Art of Balance
PT.description: Descobre o "Art of Balance" - um dos mais bem cotados e divertidos jogos para a Wii U (Nintendo Life 9/10, Nintendo Enthusiast 9/10, N-Tower 9/10)! São 200 níveis que irão desafiar a tua habilidade e imaginação. Com a sua jogabilidade perfeita e grafismo quase fotorrealista, 'Art of Balance' é fácil de começar a jogar, mas difícil de largar. Joga sozinho ou convida amigos e familiares para participarem no modo cooperativo. Queres um desafio ainda maior? Joga online contra outros jogadores ou experimenta o novo modo Endurance e melhora a tua pontuação pessoal online. Art of Balance traz a fantástica experiência “só mais um puzzle” à tua Wii U.

RU.name: Art of Balance
RU.description: Откройте для себя игру Art of Balance - одну из самых увлекательных и получивших отличные оценки игр для Wii U (Nintendo Life 9/10, Nintendo Enthusiast 9/10, N-Tower 9/10)! 200 уровней, которые бросят вызов вашему мастерству и воображению. Великолепный игровой процесс и почти фотореалистичная графика делают Art of Balance одной из тех игр, которые легко полюбить и сложно отложить в сторону. Играйте в одиночку или пригласите друзей и домочадцев для совместной игры. Вам нужно еще более серьезное соревнование? Играйте в сети с другими игроками или попробуйте новый режим игры на выносливость Endurance, чтобы улучшить свой рекорд онлайн. Играя в Art of Balance, вы с трудом оторветесь от Wii U — ведь вам все время будет хотеться решить еще одну головоломку!
